metadata.title: USN-4854-1 -- AsyncSSH vulnerability
metadata.description: Matthijs Kooijman discovered that AsyncSSH server did not properly handle authentication under certain conditions. An attacker with a specially crafted client could use this vulnerability to skip authentication of SSH sessions.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4854-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-asyncssh-doc - 1.11.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 python3-asyncssh - 1.11.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
